resources.string: 1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 1 1/4 teaspoons white sugar, 1 egg, 1 cup milk, 1/2 tablespoon butter; melted, 1/2 cup frozen blueberries; thawed

"In a large bowl, sift together flour, salt, baking powder and sugar. In a small bowl, beat together egg and milk. Stir milk and egg into flour mixture. Mix in the butter and fold in the blueberries. Set aside for 1 hour.\n Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium high heat. Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake. Brown on both sides and serve hot."
